nodes.text: Located on the Outer Rim planet Mustafar, Tulrus Island was surrounded by tall mountains, and was one of the few contant features of the lava world.

Tulrus Island was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in in the seventeenth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around April 29, 2015. Tulrus Island originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the 2003 Sony Online Entertainment massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars Galaxies, as part of its 2005 expansion, Trials of Obi-Wan.
